title: Brooklyn Circus Poster: Retro Western - Could be Hand-drawn?
content:
Hey guys, I'm looking to ID "Brooklyn Circus" typeface in this poster. I have a project I think it would go well with and wanted to save myself trouble in hand-crafting this typeface if I didn't have to.

Thanks for any help with this.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130811033624im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bkcsf_spinna_blog_6167.jpg)
author: Funyun

comments.content:
Hello:

Perhaps you can start with Letterhead™ Firehouse, some of the characters are quite similar...

Hope this would help you...

Q™ Says: It's All About The Fonts!
That looks close enough for me. I'll play around with it, and modify as needed. Thanks!
Emigre's Council is very similar is style, too.
